name: Craft Picker Idle Clicker Sim
description:
Craft Picker is an addictive Minecraft styled game. Start with an axe chopping wood and work your way up to unlock the other tools and resources. As you mine more resources you will be able to unlock powerups and upgrades to speed up the process.

Features:
*Addictive gameplay
*High quality graphics
*16 tool upgrades
*Over 20 enhancements
*Several powerups

Experience the fun now!


*** "Minecraft" is a registered trademark of Mojang AB. Craft Picker is not affiliated with Minecraft or Mojang AB in any way. ***
